data.eml:eml: Five new species of Diptilomiopidae from China (Acari: Eriophyoidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xue, Xiao-Feng, Hong, Xiao-Yue (2005): Five new species of Diptilomiopidae from China (Acari: Eriophyoidea). Zootaxa 1055: 49-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170076
